titleInfo.title: Raymond B. Witt's remarks at an informal school board meeting, 1965 April 15

mods.abstract: Transcription of Raymond B. Witt's remarks at an informal 1965 meeting of the Chattanooga, Tennessee Board of Education. Witt outlines the legal details of their case against James Mapp and states that they need to decide whether to submit to court rulings or appeal the judge's decisions.
